details.description: International Pension Centre contact details for pension enquiries if you've lived or worked abroad
details.body:
Get advice or information about pensions and benefits if you live abroad or have lived abroad.

International Pension Centre

Online enquiry form
Telephone: +44 (0)191 218 7777
Textphone: +44 (0)191 218 7280
Monday to Friday 8am to 8pm

You can also write to the following address.

International Pension Centre
Tyneview Park
Newcastle Upon Tyne
NE98 1BA
United Kingdom

You can get advice on pensions and benefits including:

  • State Pension
  • bereavement benefits
  • Incapacity Benefit

details.description: Includes calculating State Pension, eligibility, claiming and deferring
Includes holidays and finding a job
If your husband, wife or civil partner has died you may be able to get Bereavement  Payment: a one-off, tax-free, lump-sum payment of £2,000

related.title: State Pension if you retire abroad

details.description: If you're eligible for the State Pension, you can claim it while living abroad
Taking early retirement can affect how much State Pension, personal or workplace pension you get
You can claim online to get your State Pension paid directly into your bank account when you're within 4 months of your State Pension age
